ygData.subject: Re: Non-twinked Druids
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, Shahazred, I understand asking for donations. I have never had a problem when I advertise. I am talking about when people ask ME for a port. They should
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, Shahazred, I understand asking for
donations. I have never had a problem when I advertise. I am
talking about when people ask ME for a port. They should
pay if they ask! If they tell me beforehand that they
can't pay, that's no problem. When they ask for a port,
and then decide not to pay is when I get mad. It's a
matter of manners.<br>On a happier note, I held a raid
in CT last night with my guild; we got a very nice
turnout. But I made it to 35 while we were there! Finally,
my second hell lvl, and so far it looks much worse
than 30.<br><br>Kanissa Noryk of Norraths
Keepers<br>Serving Tunare for 35 (Count 'em, 35!) seasons!<br>Rodcet
Nife
